effect.scarlet-violet: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used grass pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon have halved Speed for four turns (including this one).
effect.the-teal-mask: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used grass pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon have halved Speed for four turns (including this one).
effect.the-indigo-disk: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used grass pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon have halved Speed for four turns (including this one).

short_effect.scarlet-violet: With Grass Pledge, halves opposing Pokémon’s Speed for four turns.
short_effect.the-teal-mask: With Grass Pledge, halves opposing Pokémon’s Speed for four turns.
short_effect.the-indigo-disk: With Grass Pledge, halves opposing Pokémon’s Speed for four turns.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: A column of water hits the target. When used with its fire counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a rainbow appears.
